text: @realDonaldTrump Oh hey - about that Covid-19 stuff?  The thing you can never remember the name of?  Well, it seems it hasn't left and we were all just wondering if you actually gave a crap about it?  Oh, and that bounty on the heads of soldiers? I know statues are important in your mind but ....
